title: Please don't nerf Shyvana.
body:
Just saying.

Auto me 3 times for 700 Damage level 12 is Cool on insanely tanky and fast CC gap closing monstrosity with super fast clear times and % max HP magic dmg with a well rounded hybrid damage kit is fine with completely insane itemisation and item synergies with almost unparalleled engage and focus along with working well in most team compositions.

& is not a Solo queue nightmare.

Also Yi.

Xin.

Udyr.

Warwick.

Nocturne.

Jax.

Kayle 

Irelia

Fizz

& Tryndamere - are completely fine.

replies.body:
Strange.

all those champions all benefit hard from sated.

better nerf them
I think the something that needs nerf here is Sated devourer
